trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structures that are colors of a Windows display element.
This class cannot be inherited.
Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the gradient used when the button is checked.
Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is checked.
Gets the solid color used when the button is checked.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color used when the button is checked.
Gets the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonCheckedHighlight*>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonCheckedHighlight*>.

Gets the border color to use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientBegin*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientMiddle*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientEnd*> colors.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the border color to use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientBegin*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientMiddle*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedGradientEnd*> colors.
Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is pressed down.

Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is pressed down.

Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is pressed down.

Gets the solid color used when the button is pressed down.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color used when the button is pressed down.
Gets the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedHighlight*>.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonPressedHighlight*>.

Gets the border color to use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientBegin*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientMiddle*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientEnd*> colors.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the border color to use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientBegin*>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientMiddle*>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedGradientEnd*> colors.
Gets the starting color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the starting color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
Gets the end color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the end color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
Gets the middle color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the middle color of the gradient used when the button is selected.
Gets the solid color used when the button is selected.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color used when the button is selected.
Gets the border color to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProfessionalColors.ButtonSelectedHighlight*>.

Gets the solid color to use when the check box is selected and gradients are being used.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color to use when the check box is selected and gradients are being used.

A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the solid color to use when the check box is selected and gradients are being used.
Gets the color to use for shadow effects on the grip or move handle.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color to use for shadow effects on the grip or move handle.
Gets the color to use for highlight effects on the grip or move handle.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color to use for highlight effects on the grip or move handle.
Gets the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the starting color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref>.
Gets the end color of the gradient used in the image margin of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu"></xref>.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.

<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownMenu.ShowImageMargin%2A> must be set to `true` for this color to be displayed.
